00023 TEST(BasicTests, Output001) {
00024 
00025 
00026     SystemPtr sys(new System);
00027 
00028     Output out(sys); 
00029 
00030     WaveSquarePtr gen1(new WaveSquare(sys));
00031     RandomUniformPtr gen2(new RandomUniform(sys));
00032 
00033     // to write audio file, pass the gen to the Output
00034 
00035     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, -.9);
00036     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, .9);
00037 
00038 
00039     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, .01);
00040     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, .1);
00041     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameRefresh, .5,
00042                       aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00043 
00044 
00045     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameDutyCycle, gen2);
00046 
00047     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 80,
00048                     aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00049 
00050     // out.write(gen1, 3);
00051     //gen1->printSample(6, 0, 4410);
00052 
00053 }

00193 TEST(BasicTests, Output005) {
00194 
00195     SystemPtr sys(new System(22050)); // smart pointer
00196     GeneratorFactory gf(sys); // one instance
00197     Output out(sys); 
00198 
00199 
00200     GeneratorPtr gen4 = gf.create(aw::gNameWaveSine);
00201     gen4->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, .2, aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00202     gen4->setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, .5);
00203     gen4->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 8);
00204 
00205 
00206     GeneratorPtr gen1 = gf.create(aw::gNameWaveSine);
00207     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen4, aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00208     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, 0);
00209     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 1);
00210 
00211 
00212     GeneratorPtr gen2 = gf.create(aw::gNameRandomUniform);
00213     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, -.8);
00214     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, .8);
00215 
00216 
00217     GeneratorPtr gen3 = gf.create(aw::gNameMultiply);
00218     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameOperand1, gen1);
00219     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameOperand2, gen2);
00220 
00221 
00222     GeneratorPtr gen6 = gf.create(aw::gNameWaveSine);
00223     gen6->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 3.5, aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00224     // values in midi pitch 
00225     gen6->setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, 40);
00226     gen6->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 140);
00227 
00228     GeneratorPtr gen5 = gf.create(aw::gNameFilterLowPass);
00229     gen5->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen6, aw::pContextNamePitch);
00230     gen5->setParameter(aw::pNameOperand1, gen3);
00231 
00232 
00233     //out.write(gen5, 8);
00234     //gen1->printSample(4410, 0, 10);
00235 
00236 }

00240 TEST(BasicTests, Output006) {
00241 
00242     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100)); // smart pointer
00243     GeneratorFactory gf(sys); // one instance
00244     Output out(sys); 
00245 
00246 
00247     GeneratorPtr gen1 = gf.create("click{rate{constant{120}}{bpm}amp{constant{0.9}}}");
00248 
00249     GeneratorPtr gen2 = gf.create("click");
00250     gen2->setParameter("rate", 365, "bpm");
00251     gen2->setParameter("amp", .6);
00252 
00253 
00254     GeneratorPtr gen3a = gf.create("wavesine{rate{constant{5}}{sec}min{constant{.1}}max{constant{.6}}}");
00255 
00256     GeneratorPtr gen3 = gf.create("click");
00257     gen3->setParameter("rate", 1220, "bpm");
00258     gen3->setParameter("amp", gen3a);
00259 
00260     GeneratorPtr gen4 = gf.create("click{rate{constant{65}}{bpm}amp{constant{-0.8}}}");
00261 //     gen4->setParameter("rate", 65, "bpm");
00262 //     gen4->setParameter("amp", -.8);
00263 
00264 
00265     GeneratorPtr gen5 = gf.create("add");
00266     gen5->setParameter("op1", gen1);
00267     gen5->setParameter("op2", gen2);
00268     gen5->setParameter("op3", gen3);
00269     gen5->setParameter("op4", gen4);
00270 
00271     //out.write(gen5, 10);
00272 //     gen1->printSample(4410, 0, 10);
00273 
00274 }

00284 
00285     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100)); // smart pointer

00287     Output out(sys); 
00288

00296     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, .4);
00297 // 
00298 //     GeneratorPtr gen5 = gf.create(aw::gNameFilterHighPass);

00301 // 
00302

00304     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen1, aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);

00323 TEST(BasicTests, OutputProblemCase01) {
00324 
00325     // this shows how fq modulation continually increases
00326     // not a result of passing the wrong sample time to the new value GeneratorFactory
00327     
00328     // values provided by fq mod generator are correct, and not increasing
00329     
00330     // problem might be due to doing fq mod at non zero crossing
00331 
00332     SystemPtr sys(new System(22050)); // smart pointer
00333     GeneratorFactory gf(sys); // one instance
00334     Output out(sys); 
00335 
00336 
00337     GeneratorPtr gen4 = gf.create(aw::gNameWaveSine);
00338     gen4->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 4, aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00339     gen4->setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, 200);
00340     gen4->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 202);
00341 
00342     // control frequency of this oscillator b/n 200 and 210
00343     GeneratorPtr gen1 = gf.create(aw::gNameWaveSine);
00344     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen4, aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00345     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, -.8);
00346     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, .8);
00347 
00348 
00349 //     GeneratorPtr gen2 = gf.create(aw::gNameRandomUniform);
00350 //     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, -.8);
00351 //     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, .8);
00352 // 
00353 // 
00354 //     GeneratorPtr gen3 = gf.create(aw::gNameMultiply);
00355 //     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameOperand1, gen1);
00356 //     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameOperand2, gen2);
00357 // 
00358 
00359     // out.write(gen1, 8);
00360 
00361     //gen1->printSample(4410, 0, 10);
00362 
00363 }
